content: insert hook into chain-space or skipped st two row below yo and pull up a loop in line with loops on the hook 5 loops on hook yo insert hook in next 1-chain space yo and pull up a loop in line with loops on the hook yo and pull through all 7 loops on the hook feather stitch s fes s yo insert hook into same chain-space as last part of bfs or fes yo and pull up a loop in line with loops on hook 3 loops on hook yo insert hook into 1-chain space or skipped st two row below yo and pull up a loop in line with loops on hook 5 loops on hook yo insert hook in next 1-chain space yo and pull thank you for respecting the creative work and effort that has gone into designing this pattern happy crocheting **product ** dakota drawstring bag crochet pattern **purpose/function ** a downloadable pdf pattern that guides you step-by-step to create a stylish textured bag this pattern is perfect for personal use or creating handmade gifts for friends and family **target audience ** suitable for intermediate and experienced crocheters who enjoy making wearable projects **features and benefits** **features ** clear step-by-step written instructions with stitch abbreviations high-resolution photos for key steps to guide visual learners yarn and hook recommendations for optimal results **benefits ** easy-to-follow instructions save time and reduce frustration gain confidence in working with textured stitches create a versatile and fashionable accessory that s perfect for gifting or selling **technical information** **file format ** pdf format delivered in uk terms **file size ** approximately 8 mb **device/software compatibility ** compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers **internet requirements ** an internet
